metadata.Title: CVE-2019-11455 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: A buffer over-read in Util_urlDecode in util.c in Tildeslash Monit before 5.25.3 allows a remote authenticated attacker to retrieve the contents of adjacent memory via manipulation of GET or POST parameters. The attacker can also cause a denial of service (application outage). Zack Flack discovered a buffer overread when Monit decoded certain crafted URLs. An attacker could exploit this to leak potentially sensitive information.

criterions.comment: monit package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:5.25.3-1').
